title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
Catch every swell, skip every charge. The Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition is the rugged GPS outdoor watch built for wave chasers and adventure seekers who want more time in the water and less time on the charger. With solar charging, you can get unlimited battery life in smartwatch mode with just 3 hours of bright sunlight per day (50,000 lux), and up to 48 hours in GPS mode with continuous solar—so your training, tracking, and tides keep rolling as long as you do.

Designed for surfers, windsurfers, and kiteboarders, it packs dedicated surf metrics including wave counter, max speed, distance, and tide data, plus wind and kite sport profiles with GPS position, speed, distance, heart rate, and jump elevation tracking. Pair with Surfline Sessions to automatically create videos of every wave you ride at supported breaks and review your performance after the session.

Navigate confidently with multi-GNSS support (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo), a 3-axis compass, and a barometric altimeter. Use TracBack routing to retrace your path when the coastline gets unfamiliar. Preloaded activity profiles go beyond the break—running, biking, swimming, and strength training are ready at a tap.

Stay in tune with your body thanks to advanced health monitoring, including 24/7 wrist-based heart rate, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox, respiration, and stress tracking. Smart notifications keep you connected on the go, and Connect IQ compatibility lets you customize your watch with apps, widgets, and data fields. Note: Garmin Pay availability varies by model; check specific configuration.

Built to thrive where you do, the Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition features a 45 mm fiber-reinforced polymer case, scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla Glass, and is water rated to 100 meters with thermal and shock resistance—perfect for Bells Beach and beyond.

Why you’ll love it:
- Solar-powered endurance: ride longer, train smarter, charge less.
- Surf and wind sport features that capture every stat that matters.
- Rugged, ocean-ready build with 100 m water rating.
- Accurate navigation and safety with multi-satellite support and TracBack.
- Holistic wellness insights to optimize recovery and performance.

Own every session, from dawn patrol to sunset glass. Garmin Instinct 2 Solar Surf-Edition—made for waves, built for the wild.
